qas.question: Who won season seven of American Idol?
Who was the first Rock and Roll artist to win American Idol?

context: The finalists were Cook and Archuleta. <a0_0><a1_0><a3_0>David Cook<a3_0/><a1_0/><a0_0/> was announced the winner on <a2_0>May 21, 2008<a2_0/>, the first rocker to win the show. Both Cook and Archuleta had some success as recording artists with both selling over a million albums in the U.S.
